User GuideÂ¶

The ansys.dpf.core package is a python client API giving an easy access to Data Processing Framework (DPF) post processing capabilities. Highly efficient computation, customization and remote post processing is made accessible in python with this package.

This guide provides a general overview of the basics and usage of DPF. The most common entities are presented :

  • the Model in The DPF Model helps to access results and metadata from result files

  • the Operator in Operators is the only object used to create and transform the data

  • the Field (contained in the Fields Container) Fields Container and Fields is the main simulation data container.

A quick explaination on how to plot results via pyVista is also provided in Plotting.

Using DPF Through Docker The DPF Model
